When I looked at the image, I had the feeling, that a little more sun would be beneficial. I used a masked Exposure adjustment layer and with a soft brush I faked a sun behind the lamp post. I was prepared to remove it, I just wanted to see how it looks, but surprisingly it fit the mood and looked not even that wrong, so I kept it ðŸ˜„
